overview: Luka Sklizovic is a co-founder and Chief Operating Officer at TekTrak, a mobile security company, based in Los Angeles, CA. Luka founded TekTrak along with Arik Waldman and Dan Russ during their MBA studies at UCLA Anderson. Prior to TekTrak, Luka started and ran his own company, Imobilia LLC., which was involved in real estate development, and had businesses in the food service industry. Luka managed a team of over 50 people and oversaw all aspect of the operations within the company. Through successful marketing and business development he has been able to grow the startup into a successful and profitable company. Luka has a B.A. in Finance from Emory University and an MBA from UCLA Anderson School of Management.
